definition: extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳

sentences.english: Compounding the problems of the quake aftermath will likely be the numerous aftershocks that accompany any major earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 震后的问题中可能还有伴随大震而来的无数余震。

sentences.english: Aftershocks extended along the fault system in both directions.
sentences.chinese: 余震沿着断层系统向两个方向延伸。

sentences.english: After-shocks were being felt nearly a day after the initial quake struck.
sentences.chinese: 地震发生后一天仍余震不断。

sentences.english: You know, only if you were there did you realize that after the quake, there were follow-on quakes for days on end.
sentences.chinese: 只有身处日本，你才知道大地震后余震持续了多少天。

sentences.english: While aftershocks from theearthquake continued, the tsunami wreaked the most damage.
sentences.chinese: 虽然震后余震不断，海啸才是最残暴的苦主。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, that city was jolted early Friday by another strong aftershock.
sentences.chinese: 同时，那个城市星期五早上又有强烈余震发生。

sentences.english: We're feeling an aftershock right now, Kiran.
sentences.chinese: 我们刚刚感觉到了余震。
每次余震都让李女士心有余悸。

sentences.english: This result has a certain reference value for forecasting of main shock and the maximum aftershock.
sentences.chinese: 该结果对主震和最大余震的预测具有一定的参考价值。

sentences.english: It can happen with a month, or within days, from the main shock.
sentences.chinese: 余震可以在主震发生后的一个月或者几天之内发生。

sentences.english: A powerful aftershock occurred at 01:15 local time Tuesday (2315 GMT Monday).
sentences.chinese: 一次较为强力的余震发生于周二凌晨一点十五分。

sentences.english: In Mae Sai, an aftershock rattled local residents at 5:37 on Saturday morning.
sentences.chinese: 在梅塞，星期六早晨5:37居民们被余震吓了一跳。

sentences.english: More houses collapse in after-shocks in Myanmar northeastern part.
sentences.chinese: 缅甸东北部地区发生余震，不断有房屋倒塌。

sentences.english: At least 20 aftershocks registering a 6.0 magnitude or hellogher have followed the main temblor.
sentences.chinese: 在主震过后，至少又发生了20次6级以上的余震。

sentences.english: During the night following the earthquake, 19 aftershocks were reported by the GeoNet website.
sentences.chinese: 地震发生当天晚间，地理网又报告了19次余震。

definition: powerful earthquake/abbr. for 強烈地震|强烈地震
shallow earthquake (with epicenter less than 70 km deep)
to collapse (of building, dam or bridge)
